entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
